entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
